Deprecated Classes
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IGroupListenerEventHandler
          use IGroupEventHandler instead 
de.tif.jacob.screen.ImageDecoration
            
 

Deprecated Methods
de.tif.jacob.core.definition.IAdhocBrowserDefinition.addBrowserField(int, String, String, String, SortOrder)
          use IAdhocBrowserDefinition.addBrowserField(int, String, String, SortOrder, String) instead, which additionally returns a unique browser name 
de.tif.jacob.core.definition.IAdhocBrowserDefinition.addBrowserField(String, String, String, SortOrder)
          use IAdhocBrowserDefinition.addBrowserField(String, String, SortOrder, String) instead, which additionally returns a unique browser name 
de.tif.jacob.messaging.Message.createEMailMessage(String, String)
          use EmailMessage 
de.tif.jacob.messaging.Message.createHtmlEMailMessage(String, String)
          use HtmlEmailMessage 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IClientContext.createMessageDialog(Message)
          use IClientContext.createMessageDialog(String) and the generated jacob.resource.I18N helper class. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IClientContext.createOkCancelDialog(Message, IOkCancelDialogCallback)
          use IClientContext.createOkCancelDialog(String, IOkCancelDialogCallback) and the generated jacob.resource.I18N helper class. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IBrowserEventHandler.decorateCell(IClientContext, IBrowser, int, int, String)
          use IBrowserEventHandler.decorateCell(IClientContext, IBrowser, int, int, IDataBrowserRecord, String) instead 
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IBrowserEventHandler.filterCell(IClientContext, IBrowser, int, int, String)
          use IBrowserEventHandler.filterCell(IClientContext, IBrowser, int, int, IDataBrowserRecord, String) instead 
de.tif.jacob.core.definition.IAdhocBrowserDefinition.getBrowserFields()
          use IBrowserDefinition.getBrowserField(int) and IBrowserDefinition.getFieldNumber() instead. 
de.tif.jacob.core.definition.IBrowserDefinition.getBrowserFields()
          used IBrowserDefinition.getBrowserField(int) and IBrowserDefinition.getFieldNumber() instead. 
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.ICmdEntryPoint.getMimeType(CmdEntryPointContext, Properties)
          use CmdEntryPointContext.setContentType(String) 
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.IGuiEntryPoint.getUrl(String, String, Properties)
          use EntryPointUrl.getUrl(SessionContext, IGuiEntryPoint, Properties, boolean) instead. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IGroup.isBrowserAutoSelect()
          nur temporär bitte entfernen wenn Aufgabe 504 erledigt 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IActionEmitter.isSafeSearch()
          TODO: hat nichts an eine ActionEmitter zu suchen. Bei einem 'Cancel' Button macht so eine Funktion keinen Sinn. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IButtonEventHandler.onAction(IClientContext, IGuiElement)
          override onClick instead. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IApplicationEventHandler.onShutdown()
          use IApplicationEventHandler.onShutdown(IApplicationDefinition) instead 
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IApplicationEventHandler.onStartup()
          use IApplicationEventHandler.onStartup(IApplicationDefinition) instead 
de.tif.jacob.screen.event.IOwnDrawElementEventHandler.paint(IClientContext, Graphics, Dimension)
          use paint(IClientContext context,IOwnDrawElement image, Graphics graphics, Dimension dimension) instead 
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.EntryPointUrl.popup(IClientContext)
          use the static method 'popup(...)' 
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.EntryPointUrl.popup(IClientContext, int, int)
          use the static method popup 
de.tif.jacob.messaging.Message.sendEMail(String, String)
          Use Message.createEMailMessage(String, String) instead. 
de.tif.jacob.messaging.Message.sendHtmlEMail(String, String)
          Use Message.createHtmlEMailMessage(String, String) instead. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IContainer.setActivePane(int)
          use setActivePane(IClientContext context, int paneIndex); instead 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IGroup.setBorder(boolean)
          This method will be removed in future releases. 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IGroup.setBrowserAutoSelect(boolean)
          nur temporär bitte entfernen wenn Aufgabe 504 erledigt 
de.tif.jacob.screen.IActionEmitter.setSearchMode(boolean)
          TODO: hat nichts an eine ActionEmitter zu suchen. Bei einem 'Cancel' Button macht so eine Funktion keinen Sinn. 
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.EntryPointUrl.show(IClientContext)
          use the static method 'show(...)' 
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.EntryPointUrl.toURL(SessionContext)
          This method will be protected in the next release. Use the static methods 'popup(...)' and 'show(...)' to handle entry points. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
de.tif.jacob.entrypoint.EntryPointUrl(EntryPointUrl.EntryPointType, String, Properties)
          This method will be protected in the next release. Use the static methods 'popup(...)' and 'show(...)' to work with entry points. 
de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserNotExistingException()
          use UserNotExistingException.UserNotExistingException(String)
